KESER.i2b2 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Generate & Evaluate Embedding

    get_eval_embed.Rd

    get_eval_embed acts as embedding generation & evaluation from co-occurrence data file. It returns a list of summary including meta-data, evaluation and embedding itself.

    get_eval_embed(
  CO_file,
  ARP_file,
  dims,
  CO_dict_file = NULL,
  out_dir = NULL,
  HAM_file = NULL,
  data_type = 1
)

    Arguments

    CO_file

    Co-ccurrence data file with format .csv, .parquet or .Rdata. The data should be a table with 3 columns V1, V2, V3:

    • V1: Shows the row id (code id) or row code pair.

    • V2: Shows the col id (code id) or row code pair..

    • V3: Shows the counts for certain pair.

    Note: If V1 & V2 are code ids other than code pairs, a mapping dict offering information from id to code pair is needed. Please see CO_dict_file for details.

    ARP_file

    All relation pairs data file with format .csv, .parquet or .Rdata.

    dims

    A vector of numeric values for dimension.

    CO_dict_file

    A data file with two columns, where:

    • Column 1: Shows the name of code pair.

    • Column 2: Shows the corresponding id number.

    File format can be .csv, .parquet or .Rdata.

    out_dir

    Output folder, if NULL then by default set to your_working_directory/output.

    HAM_file

    Multi-axial hierarchy data file with format .csv, .parquet or .Rdata. By default it's set to NULL and read the default file within the package. If a file name is offered, it'll read it instead and replace the default file

    data_type

    If data Does not contain CUI codes, set as 1. Otherwise, set as 2.

    Value

    A list of infomation of meta-data, embedding & evaluation result. It will be saved in out_dir as .Rdata file.

    Contents

    Developed by The package maintainer.
